db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates combining Qt 3D rendering and Qt Quick 2 elements.

db:article.db:programlisting:
!include( ../examples.pri ) { error( "Couldn't find the examples.pri file!" ) }
QT += qml quick \ concurrent \ 3dcore 3drender 3dinput \ 3dquick 3dquickrender 3dquickinput 3dquickextras \ network
CONFIG += resources_big c++11
HEADERS += \ networkcontroller.h
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ networkcontroller.cpp
OTHER_FILES += \ *.qml \ planets.js \ shaders/gl3/*.* \ shaders/es2/*.* \ doc/src/*.* \ doc/images/*.*
RESOURCES += \ planets-qml.qrc \ planets-qml-images.qrc
DISTFILES += \ PlanetsMain.qml \ android/AndroidManifest.xml \ images/license.txt
ANDROID_PACKAGE_SOURCE_DIR = $$PWD/android
